radiographic_examinations.findings: Phlegmonous soft tissue mass in the right to mid pelvis measuring 7.2 x 5.1 cm, slight increase from previous measurement of 6.7 x 4.7 cm. Mild atelectatic changes at the lung bases bilaterally, no pleural effusions, no free air in the abdomen, hypodense left renal lesion likely a cyst.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mass size increased from 6.7 x 4.7 cm to 7.2 x 5.1 cm.
